span.p: Are your FlashAlert settings up-to-date? Be sure to download the app if you haven't already done so to make sure you are among the first to hear about school closures or delays.

a.title: Go to comments for Stay Up-to-Date on Weather News

span.p: Don't miss out on opportunities! The district isnow using the Peachjar electronic flyer distribution system instead of sending flyers home. To receive flyers (and newsletters, opportunities and other important school info), you must have an email address on record with your school. Call them today to share your email address!

a.title: Go to comments for Don't miss out on opportunities!

img.alt: Agnes Stewart Middle School Counselor Kate Mather sits in her office

div.p: We recently launched a new social media project called Humans of SPS! The weekly Instagram posts aim to capture Springfield Public Schools staff and showcase some of the hard work, passion and heart that they bring to SPS buildings and our community every single day.

a.title: Go to comments for Humans of SPS
